metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14874 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In the __i2b function of the newlib libc library, all versions prior to3.3.0 (see newlib/libc/stdlib/mprec.c), Balloc is used to allocate a biginteger, however no check is performed to verify if the allocationsucceeded or not. The access of _ x[0] will trigger a null pointerdereference bug in case of a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: newlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
gcc-snapshot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
